backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the dental clinic backend, defining data types and CRUD operations for appointments, reviews, doctors, services, before/after gallery, and user profiles, with role-based access control via mixins.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping feature IDs to their titles, affected files, component dependencies, and test IDs, documenting UI/UX requirements for the dental clinic frontend.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON object containing one-line summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the purpose and key details of each component, page, and hook.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS entry point that imports Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, borders, and chart variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, setting the page title to 'XYZ Dental Clinic' and mounting the app via the root div and main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all public, service detail, and admin routes, wraps the app in QueryClient and ThemeProvider, and defines Layout and AdminLayout components.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated or non-admin users to the access-denied page, showing a spinner while authentication and admin status are being resolved.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundPartic: Decorative fixed-position background component that renders 18 randomly positioned, animated SVG particles (tooth, plus, sparkle, circle shapes) with low opacity for visual ambiance.
frontend/src/components/BeforeAfterSlide: A draggable before/after image comparison slider component that fetches pairs from an API or falls back to static defaults, rendering each pair with a draggable divider handle supporting both mouse and touch events.
frontend/src/components/BookAppointmentD: A modal dialog form for booking dental appointments, collecting patient name, phone, service type, and preferred date, then submitting via a mutation hook and showing a confirmation message on success.
frontend/src/components/ClinicStatusBann: Displays a top-of-page alert banner when the clinic status is 'closed' or 'emergency', fetched via a query hook, with appropriate icons and messages for each state.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: A scroll-animated contact section displaying clinic phone, WhatsApp link, address, and hours alongside an embedded Google Maps iframe.
frontend/src/components/CustomCursor.tsx: A disabled custom cursor component that renders nothing, deferring to the native OS cursor.
frontend/src/components/DoctorProfile.ts: A scroll-animated section showcasing the doctor's profile photo, bio, experience stats, and specialty tags in a two-column layout.
frontend/src/components/FloatingDentalEl: Renders four floating dental icon images with CSS bob animations and scroll-based parallax offsets, positioned absolutely as non-interactive decorative elements.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A site footer with brand info, quick links, contact details, a caffeine.ai attribution link, and a hidden admin login modal triggered by a low-opacity tooth icon button.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with brand logo, desktop/mobile navigation links, and a 'Book Appointment' button that opens the BookAppointmentDialog.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with a background image, scroll-reveal animation, headline text, and buttons to book an appointment or navigate to services.
frontend/src/components/HiddenAdminLogin: A dialog modal with hardcoded credential validation that redirects to the admin dashboard on successful login.
frontend/src/components/HiddenAdminTrigg: An invisible fixed element in the bottom-right corner that opens the admin login modal on double-click or double-tap.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout, showing loading state and clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/ScrollProgressBa: A fixed top progress bar that fills left-to-right based on the user's scroll position on the page.
frontend/src/components/ServicesGrid.tsx: Displays a grid of premium service cards (with hover effects and navigation) and a list of standard services, both with scroll-reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialCarou: An auto-scrolling infinite carousel of patient testimonials, using backend-fetched reviews when available or falling back to static data.
frontend/src/components/TypewriterText.t: A component that animates text character-by-character once it enters the viewport using a scroll-reveal hook.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name, then saves it via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ZoomInImage.tsx: Image component that animates from scaled-down and transparent to full size when scrolled into view using the useScrollReveal hook.
frontend/src/context/CursorContext.tsx: React context that tracks and exposes a cursor icon state ('default' or 'dental') with a setter for global cursor customization.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlassmorphismRevea: Hook that uses IntersectionObserver to set a visibility flag when an element enters the viewport, intended for glassmorphism reveal animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and exposing identity and login status via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralized collection of React Query hooks for all backend interactions including appointments, clinic status, services, reviews, and user profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Generic hook that uses IntersectionObserver to toggle a visibility boolean when a referenced element scrolls into view, triggering once per element.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextScramble.ts: Hook that animates text with a scramble effect when the element enters the viewport, progressively resolving random characters to the target string.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining the OKLCH color system, Tailwind base layers, animated mesh gradient background, scroll reveal animations, and glassmorphism utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: Full-page access denied screen with a shield icon and a button to navigate back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Appointments.ts: Admin page that lists all appointments with patient details, status badges, and buttons to confirm or cancel pending appointments using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/BeforeAfterMana: Admin page for uploading before/after image pairs with drag-and-drop support, description input, upload progress tracking, and display of existing pairs.
Admin page with a form to submit patient reviews (name, text, star rating) that are saved in a pending state awaiting approval.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Dashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard showing clinic status controls (open/closed/emergency), a tabbed appointments table with status badges, and navigation links to other admin sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DoctorScheduler: Admin page for adding new doctors (name and specialty) and listing all existing doctors, using React Query hooks and toast notifications.
Admin page for moderating pending patient reviews, allowing admins to approve or delete each review with star ratings and optional photos.
Admin page for editing a fixed list of premium dental services, supporting display name, description, and featured photo upload with progress tracking.
Detail page for the Dental Implants service, featuring a hero section, benefits grid, and step-by-step process timeline with scroll-reveal animations and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Main home page that composes all major sections: clinic status banner, hero, services grid, doctor profile, before/after slider, testimonials, and contact.
frontend/src/pages/InvisalignDetail.tsx: Detail page for the Invisalign service, showcasing benefits, a before/after slider, and a booking dialog with scroll-reveal animations throughout.
Detail page for Laser Dentistry, highlighting benefits and specific treatments with an animated laser-beam hero decoration, scroll-reveal sections, and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/PediatricDentistryDet: Detail page for Pediatric Dentistry, presenting child-friendly features and early-habit messaging with a colorful hero, scroll-reveal animations, and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetail.tsx: Generic service detail page that fetches service data by route param, displays a featured photo, description, and key features, with a booking dialog and loading spinner.
frontend/src/pages/SmileMakeoverDetail.t: Detail page for the Smile Makeover service, featuring a hero section, list of included treatments, before/after image sliders, and a booking dialog with scroll-reveal animations throughout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters (including hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom colors (teal, royal-blue, CSS variable-based semantic tokens), fonts, shadows, and animations including mesh gradient and float effects.
project_state.json: Tracks project state version 19 for a premium dental clinic website, documenting features, architectural notes, design decisions (GSAP animations, glassmorphism, admin panel via footer tooth logo), and known issues.
